item.title: Reinforcement Learning Reading List
item.description: Current Draft: 2018-11-26 Here’s a list to Reinforcement Learning ideas and papers. It is mostly for personal research, as part of my work as PhD student at the University of Texas at Austin. Course: Research Elective Fall 2019 Advisor: Prof. Stephen G. Walker Note: This is not an extensive literature review, but a broad overview to guide our research, with the specific goal of exploring and extracting the statistical and probabilistic ideas and areas of opportunity in reinforcement learning literature.
